<<<<<<< HEAD
A fit guest for the Lords table. Or, a treatise declaring the true vse of the Lords Supper Profitable for all communicants, as a preseruatiue against all profanesse and sundry nouell opinions. Tuke, Thomas, d. 1657.
[8], 186 p.
printed by Edw: Allde, and are to be sold by H. Rockit, at his shop in the Poultry, vnder the Diall, London : 1609.
Copy at reel 2086 lacks leaves K2-K7. Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
